title: The Novelist
description: Tom Bolden was living a pretty charmed life. He had wealth, women and success. He had made a name for himself publishing best-selling sexual thrillers rooted in dominance and submission – an echo of his own secret life. But everything changes when an unexpected visitor arrives on his doorstep. With his parents’ marriage collapsing, Tom finds himself stuck in the middle while juggling his career, his lifestyle and his emotionally fragile mother. Over the course of one fateful week that will change their lives forever, he realizes that his obsession with control and dominance may be the only tool he has to salvage the situation and establish himself as an accomplished Dominant.
author: Bedford Hughes
